verses.text_plain: Whoso loveth instruction loveth knowledge: but he that hateth reproof is brutish.
verses.verse_html: 1Whoso loveth instruction loveth knowledge: but he that hateth reproof is brutish.

verses.text_plain: A good man obtaineth favour of the Lord: but a man of wicked devices will he condemn.
verses.verse_html: 2A good man obtaineth favour of the Lord: but a man of wicked devices will he condemn.

verses.text_plain: A man shall not be established by wickedness: but the root of the righteous shall not be moved.
verses.verse_html: 3A man shall not be established by wickedness: but the root of the righteous shall not be moved.

verses.text_plain: A virtuous woman is a crown to her husband: but she that maketh ashamed is as rottenness in his bones.
verses.verse_html: 4A virtuous woman is a crown to her husband: but she that maketh ashamed is as rottenness in his bones.

verses.text_plain: The thoughts of the righteous are right: but the counsels of the wicked are deceit.
verses.verse_html: 5The thoughts of the righteous are right: but the counsels of the wicked are deceit.

verses.text_plain: The words of the wicked are to lie in wait for blood: but the mouth of the upright shall deliver them.
verses.verse_html: 6The words of the wicked are to lie in wait for blood: but the mouth of the upright shall deliver them.

verses.text_plain: The wicked are overthrown, and are not: but the house of the righteous shall stand.
verses.verse_html: 7The wicked are overthrown, and are not: but the house of the righteous shall stand.

verses.text_plain: A man shall be commended according to his wisdom: but he that is of a perverse heart shall be despised.
verses.verse_html:
8A man shall be commended according to his wisdom: but he that is of a perverse heart shall be despised. ▼
▼ of a…: Heb. perverse of heart

tokens.text: but he that is of a perverse

footnotes.body_text: ▼ of a…: Heb. perverse of heart
footnotes.body_html: ▼ of a…: Heb. perverse of heart

verses.text_plain: He that is despised, and hath a servant, is better than he that honoureth himself, and lacketh bread.
verses.verse_html: 9He that is despised, and hath a servant, is better than he that honoureth himself, and lacketh bread.

verses.text_plain: A righteous man regardeth the life of his beast: but the tender mercies of the wicked are cruel.
verses.verse_html:
10A righteous man regardeth the life of his beast: but the tender mercies of the wicked are cruel. ▼
▼ tender…: or, bowels

verses.text_plain: He that tilleth his land shall be satisfied with bread: but he that followeth vain persons is void of understanding.
verses.verse_html: 11He that tilleth his land shall be satisfied with bread: but he that followeth vain persons is void of understanding.

verses.text_plain: The wicked desireth the net of evil men: but the root of the righteous yieldeth fruit.
verses.verse_html:
12The wicked desireth the net of evil men: but the root of the righteous yieldeth fruit. ▼
▼ the net: or, the fortress

footnotes.body_html: ▼ the net: or, the fortress

verses.text_plain: The wicked is snared by the transgression of his lips: but the just shall come out of trouble.
verses.verse_html:
13The wicked is snared by the transgression of his lips: but the just shall come out of trouble. ▼
▼ The wicked…: Heb. The snare of the wicked is in the transgression of lips

footnotes.body_text: ▼ The wicked…: Heb. The snare of the wicked is in the transgression of lips
footnotes.body_html: ▼ The wicked…: Heb. The snare of the wicked is in the transgression of lips

verses.text_plain: A man shall be satisfied with good by the fruit of his mouth: and the recompence of a man’s hands shall be rendered unto him.
verses.verse_html: 14A man shall be satisfied with good by the fruit of his mouth: and the recompence of a man’s hands shall be rendered unto him.

verses.text_plain: The way of a fool is right in his own eyes: but he that hearkeneth unto counsel is wise.
verses.verse_html: 15The way of a fool is right in his own eyes: but he that hearkeneth unto counsel is wise.

verses.text_plain: A fool’s wrath is presently known: but a prudent man covereth shame.
verses.verse_html:
16A fool’s wrath is presently known: but a prudent man covereth shame. ▼
▼ presently: Heb. in that day

footnotes.body_html: ▼ presently: Heb. in that day

verses.text_plain: He that speaketh truth sheweth forth righteousness: but a false witness deceit.
verses.verse_html: 17He that speaketh truth sheweth forth righteousness: but a false witness deceit.

verses.text_plain: There is that speaketh like the piercings of a sword: but the tongue of the wise is health.
verses.verse_html: 18There is that speaketh like the piercings of a sword: but the tongue of the wise is health.

verses.text_plain: The lip of truth shall be established for ever: but a lying tongue is but for a moment.
verses.verse_html: 19The lip of truth shall be established for ever: but a lying tongue is but for a moment.

verses.text_plain: Deceit is in the heart of them that imagine evil: but to the counsellors of peace is joy.
verses.verse_html: 20Deceit is in the heart of them that imagine evil: but to the counsellors of peace is joy.

verses.text_plain: There shall no evil happen to the just: but the wicked shall be filled with mischief.
verses.verse_html: 21There shall no evil happen to the just: but the wicked shall be filled with mischief.

verses.text_plain: Lying lips are abomination to the Lord: but they that deal truly are his delight.
verses.verse_html: 22Lying lips are abomination to the Lord: but they that deal truly are his delight.

verses.text_plain: A prudent man concealeth knowledge: but the heart of fools proclaimeth foolishness.
verses.verse_html: 23A prudent man concealeth knowledge: but the heart of fools proclaimeth foolishness.

verses.text_plain: The hand of the diligent shall bear rule: but the slothful shall be under tribute.
verses.verse_html:
24The hand of the diligent shall bear rule: but the slothful shall be under tribute. ▼
▼ slothful: or, deceitful

verses.text_plain: Heaviness in the heart of man maketh it stoop: but a good word maketh it glad.
verses.verse_html: 25Heaviness in the heart of man maketh it stoop: but a good word maketh it glad.

verses.text_plain: The righteous is more excellent than his neighbour: but the way of the wicked seduceth them.
verses.verse_html:
26The righteous is more excellent than his neighbour: but the way of the wicked seduceth them. ▼
▼ excellent: or, abundant

verses.text_plain: The slothful man roasteth not that which he took in hunting: but the substance of a diligent man is precious.
verses.verse_html: 27The slothful man roasteth not that which he took in hunting: but the substance of a diligent man is precious.

tokens.text: not that which he took in hunting

verses.text_plain: In the way of righteousness is life; and in the pathway thereof there is no death.
verses.verse_html: 28In the way of righteousness is life; and in the pathway thereof there is no death.
